The vampirs used to drink swine blood. So, what, they got tired of it? We just looked too tasty?

I need to know how far-spread among them this is. Believe it or not, they were friendly with us once.

I need you to collect hearts from {@LinkCreature:16#2201#vampir henchmen} and {@LinkCreature:16#2202#retiariuses}. Then I'll be able to see what they've been drinking.

You got these from the vampirs? You're absolutely sure? But they're completely dry. These hearts haven't seen blood in quite some time. Unusual, to say the least.

How are they surviving without blood? What did they do with Jadan's blood, if not drink it?
I can't know what's going on without first seeing their hearts. They've gone much too far now.
